document_data.name: Hillsfar Docks
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hillsfar Docks''' was a small hamlet located outside the walls of [[Hillsfar]] on the shore of the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]].
document_data.Activities: The hamlet was home to around 200 people around [[1367 DR]]. Several inns and taverns were constructed around the main harbor area which served as the staging area for Hillsfar's water traffic.
document_data.Defenses: A force of 100 [[Red Plumes]] guarded the docks at any given time. They were stationed in an easily defended stone tower that also doubled as a lighthouse for the harbor.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Spies for the [[Hillsfar Rogues' Guild|rogues' guild]] were rumored to lurk in the area.
